entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
